RelatedSentence: WELLINGTON - New Zealand Women 's Affairs Mini ster Jo Goodhew is hoping to strengthen links with China in helping women achieve economic independence when she attends the Asia - Pacific Economic Cooperation ( APEC ) Women and Economy Forum in Beijing this week .
